title: When is DJ Sona being released?
body: Just so I know not to play League for a few months while we wait for all the bads to weed out.

replies.body:
As Sona is a support I highly doubt we'll see DJ Sona spammed as much as Udyr's default skin and PF Ezreal.

The skin hype has actually gotten me into playing some Sona, I haven't really played her in a long time, especially not since her rework. It's also good fun that Sona's counters aren't played a lot at the moment.
As a support main I shall spam Sona and this skin for a week. Then it's back to Thresh and Karma.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hwetQ5ug,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-02-06T03:22:41.217+0000)
>
> As a support main I shall spam Sona and this skin for a week. Then it's back to Thresh and Karma.

Karma ADC?
Not after what happened last night. All you and Horse had to do was swap builds back to normal!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hwetQ5ug,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T04:38:47.138+0000)
>
> Not after what happened last night. All you and Horse had to do was swap builds back to normal!!!

He encouraged me to do it. I swear I am a good player.
Please believe me, hahaha.

Edit: http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78052465/200616881?tab=overview COME ON, I HAD A REASONABLE SCORE.
But vayne became so painful. It hurt so bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hwetQ5ug,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T04:50:04.641+0000)
>
> But vayne became so painful. It hurt so bad.

Don't blame me! I fed Tristana, not Vayne.

Riot, 
With the skin you have filled my life with DJ Sona joy.
And emptied my wallet.
Best skin EVA :D

actually they said she wont be out by 5.3, 

"Hey just to clarify DJ Sona will not be out in patch 5.3. She's going to be on PBE for an extended period of time in order for her to get the proper amount of quality testing! She's very very complicated. @u@"

still can't wait for her she seems so cool, though i prefer playing her mid
Riot already confirmed that DJ Sona won't be in Patch 5.3.

Man that is my attitude as well. Only I will instabuy the skin and not use it for a month and a half until the hype train dies down. As for a release date, I don t think it will be released this week or next week, but I could be wrong.
Patch 5.30. I expect it to be coming around in say a week or two from now.
